What’s Forward EPS?

Forward Eps is just an estimate based on past performance

Suppose a company eps grown from 4 to 10 in 5 year means 20% CAGR 
Then we will assume that it can do same in next 5 year from 10 to 25.

In between if company has done CAPEX then chances of earnings
